content: Linkedin Monique Barnes Vice President of Education, Quality and Care Delivery Monique Barnes brings a combination of management and clinical expertise with 20 years of experience in Dialysis. She oversees all areas of clinical operations, including In-Center, Home, Quality/regulatory, and the education departments of DCC. Monique believes in impacting the lives of dialysis patients by offering high-quality care and that of healthcare personnel by ensuring a safe and nurturing environment.Monique holds an MBA degree coupled with HCM and BSN, which gives her the unique expertise to find creative ways to solve problems. She is also a member of the American Nephrology Nurses Association (ANNA). Linkedin Gary Joslin Vice President of In-Center Clinical Operations Gary Joslin serves as Vice President of In-Center Clinical Operations at Dialysis Care Center, bringing with him an impressive track record in leadership and clinical expertise. Gary is proud of his 25 years of distinguished service in various medical roles within the US Army, including his time as a Combat Medical Specialist.Gary completed his studies in Business Administration at Grantham University in Missouri and graduated with honors from the US Army Academy of Health Science.
title: Leadership - Dialysis Care Center
